summary: *Naruto* is a popular Japanese comic (manga) series about a young ninja, Naruto Uzumaki. He wants to be the best in his village and be recognized by everyone. The story follows his adventures as he grows up and trains to be a powerful ninja. It was written by Masashi Kishimoto and turned into an anime TV show and movies. *Naruto* is super famous and has sold millions of copies worldwide, making it one of the top-selling manga series ever!
title: Naruto
